p: Fungal viability was achieved by adding a sterilized stem to each well that did not show fungal growth and subculturing in an Sabouraud Dextrose Agar (SDA, Himedia, India) petri dish. The plates were incubated at 37 °C for 24 h and, subsequently, the development or suppression of fungal colonies (Morais-Braga et al. 2016) was verified.
